C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: Google, BreakBeforeBraces: Attach, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: false, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, AllowShortLoopsOnASingleLine: false, AlwaysBreakBeforeMultilineStrings: true, IndentWidth: 4, ColumnLimit: 0, BreakBeforeBinaryOperators: All, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: false }
